iati-activity.title: Better Understanding Complementary Basic Education in Ghana
iati-activity.description: An evaluation of the DFID and USAID funded complementary basic education programme in Ghana, which aims to provide accelerated numeracy and literacy skills to previouos out of school children
iati-activity.activity-status: Inception report submitted 23/01/2017, implementation beginning in earnest
iati-activity.participating-org: IMC as lead firm in a consortium including: RTI International, University of Cambridge, University of Sussex, JEAVCO Associates and PAB Consult
